name: CSV
description: Creates and Edits Comma-separated Variable Files

params.name: filePath
params.description: Enter the absolute file path where you want to create the CSV file. All directories should be present.

params.name: headers
params.description: When adding the headers, separate them with a new line or pass an array of strings (could be JSON). Each header represents a column in the CSV file.

params.name: data
params.description: Expects array of objects in format {propertyName: value}, where propertyName is column name (one of the header strings provided in the previous parameter).

params.name: filePath
params.description: Enter the absolute file path of the CSV file to insert rows into. All directories should be present.

params.name: data
params.description: Expects array of objects in format {propertyName: value}, where propertyName is column name (one of the header strings provided in the previous parameter).

params.name: filePath
params.description: Enter the absolute file path where you want to create the CSV file. All directories should be present.

params.name: headers
params.description: Headers list, one per line or separated by comma.

params.name: rowValues
params.description: CSV values separated by comma or by new line.

params.name: filePath
params.description: Enter the absolute file path of the CSV file to insert rows into. All directories should be present.

params.name: rowValues
params.description: CSV values separated by comma or by new line.
